item.description:
Sierra Club & Beer.....rages on!!! Welcome to all new meetup group members! Come join us at Orleans Bar and Restaurant on Wed., May 3rd at 6:30 p.m. for another great event with new ideas and opportunities! Meet other people who are concerned about our environment, learn about what's happening locally, discuss creative solutions, or just have a good time. Cash bar, limited free appetizers.

Orleans Bar and Restaurant
65 Holland St, Somerville
steps from Davis Square station

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: Sierra Club & Beer!
